column4: Can't seem to get DVD to play under Ubuntu Hoary
I get:  Totem could not play 'dvd://',  Could not open resource for writing.
sorry, i'm not sure, it might be the drive itself.  you could try and convert the DVD to a format that you can read of the HDD
convert the DVD to a format... to read from the hard drive?
convert it to divx or some such.  haven't done it myself.
With Warty, I just folled ubuntu guide and DVD was working.
Hoary is the suck for DVD
that seems to have fixed the speed issue of the DVD
